name: PIR Motion Wardrobe Sensor - Merrytek
metaTitle: Merrytek PIR Motion Sensor for Wardrobes & Cabinets | Onco Solutions
metaDescription: Effortless, motion-activated lighting for your wardrobe or cabinet. The Merrytek PIR sensor is compact, easy to install, and energy-efficient.
shortDescription: Open your wardrobe — lights turn on automatically Close it — lights turn off. Save energy and enjoy effortless, motion-activated lighting with our compact PIR sensor. Easy to install. Smart. Efficient.
description_points: Motion-Activated: Lights turn on automatically when you open your wardrobe.
Energy Efficient: Lights switch off after a set time without movement.
Easy Installation: Compact and discreet design fits neatly inside wardrobes, cabinets, and closets.
Smart Sensitivity: Advanced PIR technology ensures accurate motion detection with minimal false triggers.
Customizable Timing: Set delay times according to your preference.
